student_talk_ratio.justification: The student contributes the majority of the dialogue, providing detailed explanations and solving the problem independently. The tutor's questions guide the student but do not dominate the conversation.

icap.justification: The student demonstrated a good mix of engagement levels, primarily constructive (50%) and interactive (25%), with some active engagement (25%).
